OnBoarding.descOne: Simply select your preferred location to get started, and discover top-rated providers and a wide selection of services available in your area.
OnBoarding.descTwo: Choose the service you need and the expert provider you trust, all in just a few clicks.
OnBoarding.descThree: Enjoy the flexibility to check real-time availability and book your appointment at a time that works best for you.

Sign in to your 
Account
Login.subheading: The Easy Care app meets your home needs effortlessly.

VerificationSuccess.heading: Verification Successfully

BiometricSettings.title: Biometric Login
BiometricSettings.description: Use biometric authentication to quickly and securely login to your account
BiometricSettings.descriptionWithType: Use {type} to quickly and securely login to your account
BiometricSettings.disabledMessage: You will need to login with your password next time
BiometricSettings.enabledMessage: You can now login using biometric authentication
BiometricSettings.noUserEmail: Unable to get user email. Please try again.
BiometricSettings.authenticatePromptWithType: Authenticate with {type} to enable biometric login
BiometricSettings.authFailedMessage: Biometric authentication was cancelled or failed
BiometricSettings.modalDescription: Enter your password to securely enable biometric login. You'll be able to login quickly next time.
